publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4115 Dave Thompson: Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path—That the Parliament supports the campaign to establish a Beauly to Inverness cycle path; highlights the multitude of benefits that cycling has to offer, including reducing the use of cars, traffic congestion and individuals’ carbon footprints as well as increasing the health, energy and wellbeing of cyclists, and notes that there are many people living in the area who are conscious of the benefits of cycling and would leave their cars behind to travel along this safe route. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Ian McKee*, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, John Wilson*
S3M-4115 Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path (lodged on 12 May 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-4115 Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path (lodged on 12 May 2009) Hugh Henry*

S3M-4115 Dave Thompson: Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path—That the Parliament supports the campaign to establish a Beauly to Inverness cycle path; highlights the multitude of benefits that cycling has to offer, including reducing the use of cars, traffic congestion and individuals’ carbon footprints as well as increasing the health, energy and wellbeing of cyclists, and notes that there are many people living in the area who are conscious of the benefits of cycling and would leave their cars behind to travel along this safe route. Supported by: Stuart McMillan, Ian McKee, Alasdair Allan, Rob Gibson, Ken Macintosh, John Wilson, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry
S3M-4115 Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path (lodged on 12 May 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-4115 Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path (lodged on 12 May 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4115 Build the Beauly to Inverness Cycle Path (lodged on 12 May 2009) Peter Peacock*
